title: Is Kumon English helpful for grade 7 students? - Quora

response.answer_text: Kumon Reading is very helpful. Both my sons did the Reading Program from grade school to Program Completion, which occured about halfway through high school for them. As a result, along with some test prep, they scored 34 and 35 on the ACT. This got them full scholarships to very competive programs at top universities.

Perhaps. I started English in the summer after Grade 8. It is only helpful for students who need help with comprehension, summarizing and writing skills until J level, when they start Shakespeare. Depending on what the student needs and what level of English they are at, it may be quite useful.
